title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official CLI and library for running large language models locally (Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.) with a simple REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull, push, and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; chat, generate, embed, list, delete models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in chains, agents, RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, OpenAI-compat endpoints).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent API, streaming, and model management utilities.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat interface.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight React chatbot frontend that plugs into any Ollama backend with SSE streaming.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and persistent model cache.

title: ollama-models
summary: Community-curated Modelfile recipes for quantized Llama, Mistral, CodeLlama, Zephyr, etc.

title: ollama-github-actions
summary: GitHub Action to install and start Ollama on Linux runners for CI testing of AI apps.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-django
summary: Django app with REST endpoints and admin UI to manage local Ollama models and chat sessions.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI (built with Textual) for multi-session chat, model switching, and markdown preview.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store + LlamaIndex.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings local LLMs into any server with slash commands and threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers questions using Ollama models with streaming support in threads.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with async/await, streaming, and strongly-typed request/response models.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper around Ollama’s REST API with GenServer-style process management and streaming.
